article_text:
Carrollton, GA (30117)

Today

A mix of clouds and sun. High 89F. Winds light and variable..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies during the evening giving way to a few showers after midnight. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 30%.

article_metadata.description: University of West Georgia President Dr. Kyle Marrero and his wife Dr. Jane Redding Marrero arrive at the second annual Presidential Scholarship Gala at the Campus Center Saturday. The gala
article_metadata.author: Melanie Boyd/Times-Georgian
